definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: No one near seems to be thinking, or feeling, or working.
sentences.chinese: 周围似乎没有人去思考，感觉或劳作。

sentences.english: Or I only and Barnabas, have not we power to do this?
sentences.chinese: 或者，唯有我和巴尔纳伯没有不劳作的权利吗？

sentences.english: They became farmers and merchants, worked in mills and factories.
sentences.chinese: 他们成为农民和商人，在作坊和工厂里劳作。

sentences.english: Essentially, the necessity to work comes out of the necessity to eat.
sentences.chinese: 本质上讲，劳作的必要性来源于吃的必要性。

sentences.english: They toiled on a small patch of land.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一小块土地上劳作。

sentences.english: The old walled, there are several more than 90 years old, can work.
sentences.chinese: 寨里的老人有几个九十多岁了，还能劳作。

sentences.english: A fruit tree bears fruit, so does a person's labour .
sentences.chinese: 果树结果实，人的劳作也是这样的。

sentences.english: They toiled and talked and thought;
sentences.chinese: 他们辛苦劳作，互相交谈，勤于思考。

sentences.english: Every day, he worked his heart out in the gardens.
sentences.chinese: 每天都会在花园里辛勤劳作，呕心沥血。

sentences.english: A farmer works at a laver ( edible seaweed) farm at Gutong Village in Fujian Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 中国福建省古铜村，一名农民在紫菜田里劳作。

sentences.english: The consumption of God to work, have rich harvest.
sentences.chinese: 有了耗神费心的劳作，才有了丰厚的收获。

sentences.english: With reddened fingers deformed from a lifetime of hard work, the pedicurist labored on.
sentences.chinese: 修脚师用因一生辛勤劳作而变得通红的手指工作着。

sentences.english: This set of multifunction tools can Be used for house-work with efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 多功能组合工具，家用劳作得心应手。

sentences.english: A small girl was sleeping on a bench while her mother worked. She was photographed by Theresia Aggas, 16.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在长凳上睡着了，他的母亲在身边劳作。

sentences.english: One day my parents went to work in the fields taking my little sister and Ah Fu along.
sentences.chinese: 一天，父母带着我的妹妹和阿福一起去田地里劳作。

sentences.english: While living with his father, he worked hard in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 董永从小和父亲相依为命，每天在田里辛勤劳作。

definition: face to the ground, back to the sky
pinyin: mian4 chao2 huang2 tu3 bei4 chao2 tian1
